title: PhysicalBitcoinArt
author: PhysicalBitcoinArt
content: 8"- 24" Burned Bitcoin Pine Round Shellac Finish with Custom Wordings ("Satoshi Nakamoto" - "Everything Divided by 21 Million" - "Carved @ Block Height 755,555" on the back)Burnt Bitcoin Pine Round Shellac Finish with Custom Wordings (Satoshi Nakamoto - Everything Divided by 21 Million)Offering numerous other sizes between 8 to 24" - Larger sizes available upon request as mentioned below. All carvings come with a hook to hang on your wall and pads so it does not scratch the wall as shown in the photo below.Please contact me about larger sizes then 24" and/or if you desire a custom design and/or writing on the back as shown with Carved @ Block Height 755,555https://physicalbitcoinart.com/products/burned-bitcoin-pine-round-shellac-finish-with-custom-wordings-satoshi-nakamoto-everything-divided-by-21-million?variant=43411920355563https://twitter.com/BitcoinDesigns

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Very cool.  There have been some controversial wood items sold here over the years, but they're still a nice thing to have.  I do hope that you plan to donate some of the proceeds of this product to Mick Bruce (mjbmonetarymetals), who is the guy that created the design you used, or at the very least send him one of them for free.  I see his design ripped off for products here quite a bit and it's a little disturbing for me personally when I don't see him getting credit or any thanks being paid to him.  His design is used all over the world in news articles, yet as far as I know there has been almost no payments made to him whatsoever...
